backend/main.mo: Defines core data types and initial book list for the meditation app backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping requested UI changes to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of key frontend files and recent UI/behavior updates.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RUNBOOK.md: Outlines step-by-step instructions for redeploying the app.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Template for diagnosing and resolving deployment failures.
frontend/index.css: Defines global CSS variables and base styles including light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with environment shims, global error handlers, and React mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theme and error boundary providers.
frontend/src/components/AmbientMusicCaro: Interactive carousel for selecting ambient sounds with swipe, volume, and mute controls.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary component that catches rendering errors and displays a detailed error UI with reload option.
frontend/src/components/CloudSyncErrorBa: Banner for cloud sync/load failures that adjusts messaging by error type and provides a retry button.
frontend/src/components/DurationRangeInp: Duration slider input component for selecting a time range in minutes with live display.
frontend/src/components/FeatureCard.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/FloatingNav.tsx: Floating vertical navigation menu with animated icons and hover labels for navigating between app sections.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Mobile slide-out menu providing theme toggle, account status, login/logout actions, and navigation.
frontend/src/components/JournalFiltersDr: Filter UI for journal entries, including moods, energy, dates, favorites, and notes text with popover controls.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeBookPag: Page viewer for knowledge content supporting swipe, keyboard navigation, and smooth scrolling between pages.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeCategor: A swipeable and keyboard-navigable carousel that highlights a selected knowledge category with dynamic scaling and visibility logic.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeQuizDia: A dialog-based quiz flow with shuffled questions, progress tracking, answer persistence, and result computation.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusM: Three.js lotus model that animates petals, stem, and glow based on growth state and theme.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusP: Animated particle system around the lotus that changes motion patterns based on growth state and theme.
frontend/src/components/LotusCanvas.tsx: A full-screen animated canvas rendering lotus petals and particles with theme- and variant-based visibility effects.
frontend/src/components/MeditationCarous: A swipeable carousel for selecting meditation types, using circular index logic and animated scaling for adjacent items.
frontend/src/components/MeditationGuideS: A step-by-step meditation guide with swipe navigation, animated transitions, and automatic parsing of benefits sections.
frontend/src/components/MeditationTimerR: Canvas-based circular meditation timer with animated wave progress and theme-reactive colors.
frontend/src/components/MeditationWaveFi: Circular fill indicator using animated waves to visualize progress with theme-aware styling.
frontend/src/components/MobileBackButton: Mobile-only back button that navigates to the dashboard or triggers a custom callback.
frontend/src/components/PageBackgroundSh: Page wrapper rendering a LotusCanvas background behind provided children.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBowl.tsx: Canvas-rendered progress bowl showing liquid fill level with wave animation and theme-based colors.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusR3F: Three.js lotus visualization showing growth state, lighting, particles, and auto-rotating camera.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusSVG: SVG lotus visualization with layered petals, glow, breathing animation, and streak-based effects.
frontend/src/components/QuizDialog.tsx: Multi-step quiz dialog collecting answers and computing a recommended meditation type.
frontend/src/components/RitualSelectionM: Modal that displays up to five saved rituals, allowing users to start or delete one, with an empty-state message when none exist.
frontend/src/components/SavedRitualsCaro: Carousel for browsing, starting, and deleting rituals with swipe, navigation, and confirmation dialog support.
frontend/src/components/SessionIndicator: Displays login state and provides guest return or logout actions while clearing cached user queries.
Navigation bar with session indicator, theme toggle, and optional back button for both desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/ThemedToaster.ts: Wraps the Sonner toaster component with a container element for themed notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCloudOperation.ts: Hook providing retry-enabled cloud write operations using the current actor and identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, session state, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useMeditationTimer.ts: Implements a customizable meditation timer with pause, reset, progress tracking, and completion callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating books, profiles, journals, and guest/local storage data.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global styles, themes, and Tailwind utilities including animations and OKLCH color variables.
frontend/src/lib/bookData.ts: Exports a list of meditation-related book recommendations with Amazon links and metadata.
frontend/src/lib/knowledgeContent.ts: Provides structured educational content for meditation techniques, including pages and quiz questions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
Empty or placeholder page file for the active meditation screen.
frontend/src/pages/BookRecommendationsPa: Displays book recommendations with swipe and button navigation, cycling through cards and handling theme and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows the main dashboard with quotes, meditation selection, rituals, and navigation to pre‑meditation or quizzes.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Manages viewing, filtering, editing, favoriting, importing, and exporting journal entries with authenticated and guest modes.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgePage.tsx: Renders a knowledge library with technique categories, book content, quiz handling, and deep‑link scrolling.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing screen handling login, guest mode, theme toggle, and redirecting authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: A complex pre-meditation setup page allowing users to configure meditation type, duration, ambient sound, and mood before starting a session, with detailed guide steps and cloud-sync interactions.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays meditation progress stats with import/export functionality, cloud sync error handling, and visual progress components.
frontend/src/pages/ReflectionPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the reflection page.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the stats page.
frontend/src/utils/ambientSounds.ts: Defines ambient sound metadata and provides helpers to fetch sound info and audio paths by ID.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSync.ts: Maps backend cloud-sync errors to user-friendly messages and classifies various error types.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSyncRetry.ts: Provides retry logic for cloud operations, detecting readiness and authorization errors.
frontend/src/utils/exportImport.ts: Handles serialization, validation, and normalization of meditation-related data for export/import JSON files.
Manages quiz score storage per user using localStorage with utilities to get and save scores.
frontend/src/utils/lotusGrowthModel.ts: Computes lotus growth visuals over 0–20,000 minutes, determining phase, progress, and multiple visual parameters for rendering.
frontend/src/utils/meditationStorage.ts: Handles guest-only localStorage for journal entries, progress data, rituals, and legacy key migration.
frontend/src/utils/meditationType.ts: Validates and normalizes meditation type strings, mapping aliases and defaults to supported enum values.
frontend/src/utils/progressRanks.ts: Defines rank tiers based on total meditated minutes and provides helpers to get current, next, and formatted ranks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, layout, shadows, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, features, and pending UI polish requests for pre‑meditation and in‑session views.
